column2: We visited this place several times, the ice cream was the best, the stuff was very friendly and responsive.
We wanted food for take away, but the atmosphere was great and we decided to stay. All the food was delicious. We ordered kebap, gyros and french fries.
One of the best restaurants we visited in Athens. We asked for recommendation about the food and all of it was very delicious. And the service was excellent!
A logical extension of the walk to the Acropolis. Very rich collection and modern display of the whole site. The Karyatides are stunning, you can see them up close.

It was my second time in Acropolis and it is never enough for me. A stunning historical, archaeological and architectural place. I recommend going there early in the day, because it takes a couple of hours to feel the stunning atmosphere.

column1: We went for a dessert late at night and it was worth it.
column2: The staff is very friendly and provides detailed information about the products. You can sit in the place and enjoy the desserts or you can take it away.
